Pre-Game Insights: South Africa has defeated England by 229 runs and has the highest net-run rate among all teams in the World Cup.
Bangladesh has won their first match and lost their next three matches.
South Africa has posted 300-plus scores every time they have batted first in the World Cup.
Bangladesh's batting has collapsed frequently, leading to early dismissals.
South Africa's batters have been in excellent form, with multiple three-figure scores and the fastest centuries.
Bangladesh needs to improve their batting consistency to avoid early collapses.
South Africa has a strong record of winning when batting first in the World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa's batting has been dominant, with Heinrich Klaasen and Marco Jansen providing a destructive partnership.
Bangladesh needs to improve their bowling to contain South Africa's potent batting lineup.
The pitch at the Wankhede Stadium is expected to favor batters, with a maximum temperature of 37 degrees Celsius.
